author: Ricardo_Nth
content:
@FactoryAI is soo freaking good.

I have had a few little niggly bits in the recent updates with CPU usage - but im nit pikcing at best.

This weekend using G3 in factory i've shipped 2 client sites that look a far cry better than when i used the Astrowind template and widgets.

its such a nice CLI experience and it freaking rips in context i barely use new threads per feature, more like one per site!

I'd love a $60 or $100 sub option compared to paying overages but honestly I may just up the anty on how much I ship in a month to meet the $200 sub head on.

What a time to be alive man! The future is now and these are the droids you're looking for.

classification.label: love
classification.reason: Strong positive sentiment with praise for Factory AI's capabilities and CLI experience.

author: bentossell
content:
Factory CLI v0.26.12 Released - `/review` command

## New features

* **`/review` command** - that provides an interactive code review workflow. Review code changes in different ways: comparing against a base branch, reviewing specific commits, examining uncommitted changes, or providing custom review instructions.

## Bug fixes

* Gemini 3 Pro now uses the updated 0.8√ó pricing multiplier - replacing introductory pricing
* MCP navigator now fills the terminal
* Update routing for /resume to filter correctly to /sessions
* Position cursor at star

classification.label: other
classification.reason: This is a product announcement/release note that does not fit into any of the defined categories (mention, bug, love, question). It's purely informational content about a CLI release.

@FactoryAI Droid ‚Üí read the schema ‚Üí wrote correct queries ‚Üí pulled the actual next run ‚Üí hero 100% populated with live event
